content.rendered:
Directed by Pa. Ranjith

Written by Ranjeet Bahadur. Shivgopal Krishna. Maginan. Pa. Ranjith. M. Sreeramakrishna. Aadhavan Theetchanya

Cast Rajinikanth (Karikaalan). Nana Patekar (Haridev Abhayankar). Samuthirakani (Vaaliyappa). Easwari Rao (Selvi). Huma Qureshi (Zareena). Anjali Patil (Puyal Charumathi Gaekwad). Ravi Kale (Sunil). Sayaji Shinde (Minister). Pankaj Tripathi (Inspector Patil). Sampath Raj (Vishnu Bhai). Mithun Rajakumar (Athiyan – Rajini’s grandson).Aruldoss. Dileepan (Selvam). Nitish (Kathiravan (as Nithish)). Manikandan K.(Lenin (as Manikandan)). Vikram. Aravind Akash (Shivaji Rao Gaekwad). Ramesh Thilak (Press Reporter). Major Bikramjeet.Micky. Pradeep Kabra (Hari Dada’s Bodyguard). Yatin Karyekar. Umakanth. Suganya. Arundhati. Sakshi Agarwal (Karikaalan’s daughter in law). Vishalini. Abishek. Akilesh. Anand. Arumugam. Madhavi Ashtekar (Ishwari Rao (voice)). Saloni Umesh Burde (Khaira). Chella. Chintu. Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury. Dhilsha. Dopeadelicz (Slum Dweller). Gnanam. Jereen Ignatious (Activist (as Sudharshi)). Janaki. Jayaperumal. Kannan. Logan. Swaylee Loughnane (Sammy). Dinesh Mani. Maran. Kaasi Nadimpalli. Karuppu Nambiyaar.Pradheep.Rajesh.Rajmathan.Vinodh Sagar.Sakshi. Vishal Saroye (maharashtra C.M). Senthil. Shaan. Shan (Shan). Siva. Sivamaran. Soumya. Supergood Subramani. Subramaniyan. Sumathi (Lady in the background during Kaala-Haridev meet). Tamilarasan. Tony. Paari Venkat. Vishal

Language Tamil. Hindi

Producers Dhanush. Jairaj Parayan. Harshveer Srivastava. S. Vinod Kumar

Production Wunderbar Film
